description: Commandline to lauch powershell with a base64 payload Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Suspicious Execution of Powershell with Base64
query: ((process.executable:*\\powershell.exe AND process.command_line:(*\ \-e\ * OR *\ \-en\ * OR *\ \-enc\ * OR *\ \-enco* OR *\ \-ec\ *)) AND (NOT (process.command_line:*\ \-Encoding\ *)))
